sentences.en: Do not push me, or I wil impale you on my horns!
sentences.cn: 别推我, 要不我会用我的角顶你.

sentences.en: I say my arrow will impale your brain, now it comes.
sentences.cn: 我说过我的箭会刺穿你的脑袋, 现在它来了.

sentences.en: Impale ( Arms ) moved to Tier 3, no longer requires Deep Wounds.
sentences.cn: 天赋穿刺 ( 武器 ) 移动到第三行, 不需要重伤作为前置天赋.

sentences.en: Researchers observed one bird impale a rodent on a cactus.
sentences.cn: 研究人员观察到一只鸟把一只啮齿动物钉在一棵仙人掌上。

sentences.en: Singing among the savage branches, it impale itself upon the longest, sharpest spine.
sentences.cn: 它把自己钉在最尖最长的刺上,在蓁蓁树枝间婉啭啼鸣.

trans.tran_en: if someone or something is impaled, a sharp pointed object goes through them
